footer.followUs: Follow us on our social media!

hero.text: We are a leading Colombian company in the distribution, service and development of new technologies with a single objective, to safeguard your assets to increase the profitability of your operation; for the Oil & Gas (Upstream, Midstream, Downstream), Energy, Petrochemical, Naval and Industrial markets.

title.text: How can we support you in Royal Integrity?

whatwedo.description: At Royal Integrity we are ready to support you with specialized solutions for the protection of your assets. We offer Volatile Corrosion Inhibitors, PIG services (cleaning, instrumentation and plugs), as well as Carbon Fiber Composite Wrap repair. Contact us and we will gladly help you strengthen the integrity of your systems.

slideOne.text: Our mission is to protect the critical infrastructure and long-term investments of clients in the Oil & Gas, Energy, and Industrial sectors in Latin America. We also offer specialized solutions for corrosion protection and repair.

slideTwo.text: Extending the lifespan of equipment and improving its profitability through direct distribution, expert service, certified training, and support, we provide proven and cutting-edge technologies with unparalleled technical support, acting as partners to secure your assets and optimize your processes.

slideThree.title: Vision
slideThree.text: We envision ourselves as the global benchmark partner in integrity management throughout the asset lifecycle and corrosion protection.

slides.title: Patents, Licensing
slides.text: In partnership with Petrobras, a versatile Cleaning Jacketed Pig was developed with the capacity to be used in pipelines with different fluid phases and the facility to negotiate with two or more internal diameters to meet the particularities of the subsea pipeline system and its layout. BR Patent 102012011868-8 Ideal for: Inspection, Drying, Cleaning and Removal (Light).

slides.title: Patents, Licensing
slides.text: Pig Multisize Licensed by Petrobras, designed to attend lines with diameter variations through the use of a single tool. Diameters: 4“ x 8.5”, 8“ x 12”, 12 x 16”, among others. Ideal for: Cleaning.

slides.title: Foam Pigs
slides.text: Versatile (Low Weight and High Flexibility) ideal for large diameter reductions and steep angles. Ideal for: Inspection, Drying, Cleaning, Removal.

slides.title: Mandrel Pigs
slides.text: Versatile (allowing for quick component replacement) ideal for line preparation prior to inspection. Model LBD (Bi-Directional), Model LUN (Unidirectional). Ideal for: Cleaning, Removal, Separation and Calibration.

slides.title: Accessories for Pigs
slides.text: Essential elements that complement and optimize the performance of pigs in cleaning, dehydration and inspection tasks. Manufactured with high-strength materials, they allow pigs to be customized according to the operating conditions of the pipeline. These accessories ensure greater efficiency, adaptability and useful life of the equipment in the field.

slides.title: HFlex Pigs
slides.text: Liquid and condensate removal from gas lines, product separation, cleaning, product interface, hydrostatic test water removal with minimal risk of clogging. Ideal for: Cleaning or Draining.

slides.title: Discflex Pig
slides.text: Monolithic pigs, with changes in their chemical compositions that allow their applicability in various situations. Ideal for: Cleaning or Drainage.

slides.title: Valve Pig
slides.text: Monolithic pigs, with changes in their chemical compositions that allow their applicability in various situations. Ideal for: Cleaning or Drainage.

slides.title: Accessories for Pigs
slides.text: Essential elements that complement and optimize the performance of pigs in cleaning, dehydration and inspection tasks. Manufactured with high-strength materials, they allow pigs to be customized according to the operating conditions of the pipeline. These accessories ensure greater efficiency, adaptability and useful life of the equipment in the field.

slides.title: Hi Pressure Plug
slides.text: Sealing device, with double compression packers (Polyurethane + Tungsten Rings) designed for temporary blocking of up to 30 years of wells, coated and sacrificial anodes. Ideal for: Isolation, Sealing, Hydrostatic Testing of Lines, Wells and Christmas Trees.

slides.title: Pig Plug
slides.text: Insertion device at one end of the pipe, creating a seal (Packers in Polyurethane are Compressed and Expanded) by means of a torque tool, blocking the flow and allowing the release of Pig. Ideal for: Washing and/or Pig Launching.

slides.title: Temp. Flow Blockers
slides.text: Device for directing or diverting pig flow to specific piping lines, allowing maintenance and inspection operations to be performed efficiently and safely, being controlled through a lever. Ideal for: Temporary Flow Blocking.

slides.title: Argus Valve
slides.text: Bidirectional valves that allow launching and receiving pigs in gas lines, offering greater efficiency, safety, comfort, ease of use and reduced environmental impact. Ideal for: Launching, Receiving Pig's.

slides.title: Pig Data Logger
slides.text: Economical and Compact ILI Unit (Installed in a pig) and stand-alone, designed to record pressure, temperature and velocities through sensors.

slides.title: ILI – Unpiggable Lines
slides.text: ILI Unit for Non-Piggable Lines equipped with ultrasonic sensors to measure geometry and detect anomalies in pressurized pipelines. It performs accurate XYZ mapping and assesses the complete condition (Internal and External Wall Loss, Internal/External Discrimination, Creeps “Protrusions, Excess Penetration, Ovality”, Dents, Historical Repairs, Fouling).

slides.title: Acquarius
slides.text: Wireless smart PIG, equipped with ultrasonic sensors to measure geometry and detect anomalies in pressurized pipelines. It performs accurate XYZ mapping and evaluates the complete condition of pipelines, regardless of material “Steel, HDPE/PVC/GRP, concrete, cast iron,”. Its data is presented in an interactive and dynamic dashboard, facilitating detailed analysis of the inspected pipeline.

title.text: Discover the potential of Royal Integrity in your business!

contactUsHome.text: Transform your operation with the innovation and support of Royal Integrity!

text.partOne: Ask our experts and contact us at

formFieldContactsUs.policyDescription: In compliance with Law 1581 of 2012, we inform you that the data provided in this form will be used exclusively for your registration. You can access, update, or correct your information at any time. By submitting this form, you agree to the processing of your data in accordance with this policy.
formFieldContactsUs.policyOptionOne: I accept the personal data handling policy

hero.text: We connect innovation with the protection of your assets. Discover how our expertise and technology are transforming the industry.

imageOne.text: Our products and services are designed to extend the life of our customers' most critical assets.

imageTwo.text: We develop solutions that not only prevent failures, but also boost the efficiency and sustainability of industrial operations.

imageThree.text: We provide specialized technical support where you need it most: in the field, in real time and with qualified personnel.

imageFour.text: Our solutions evolve with your business, integrating new technologies to meet the challenges of tomorrow.

imageFive.text: Our team combines high-level academic training with real-world experience in sectors such as Oil & Gas, Energy and Marine.

imageSix.text: We offer advanced solutions and constant support to protect your infrastructure 24/7.

ourTeam.textOne: At Royal Integrity, we have a highly trained and multidisciplinary team, made up of professionals with solid backgrounds in different areas of the industry.
ourTeam.textThree: We focus on developing and designing innovative solutions that not only drive our customers' growth, but also strengthen the industrial and energy ecosystem in which we operate.

ourPath.text: At Royal Integrity we are recognized as a leader in technological solutions for the protection of industrial assets, providing cutting-edge technology and specialized support to meet the most demanding challenges in the Oil & Gas, Energy, Petrochemical, Naval and Industrial sectors.
keywords: Oil & Gas, Energy, Petrochemical, Naval and Industrial sectors

title.text: At Royal Integrity, we combine technology, experience and strategic vision to take your business to the next level!
